sen.j: 真壁峠（まかべとうげ）とは、京都府舞鶴市の西舞鶴と加佐町とを結ぶ高さ約100mの峠である。
sen.e: Makabe Toge is the a hundred meters high mountain pass between Nishi Maizuru (West Maizuru) of Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, and Kasa town.
Makabe Toge is a hundred meters high mountain pass between Nishi Maizuru (West Maizuru) of Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, and Kasa town.
Makabe Toge is a mountain pass of about 100 meters high, located between Nishi-Maizuru (West Maizuru) and Kasa-cho of Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 加佐町も舞鶴市のようですので、左記のようにしました。

sen.j: 頂上付近は山を切り立った形状をしていることから、西舞鶴市街地から峠を正面に見ると、お尻のように見えることから、「ケツ股峠」と呼ばれている。
sen.e: The area around the mountain top is shaped like it has been carved out of mountain and called as "Ketsumata-toge Pass" (Butt crack mountain pass) since it resembles a butt when viewed from front from Nishimaizuru City.

The area around the mountain top is shaped like it has been carved out of mountain and called as "Ketsumata-toge Pass" (Butt crack mountain pass) since it resembles a pair of buttocks when viewed from front from Nishimaizuru City.

The area around the mountain top is shaped like it has been carved out of mountain and called as 'Ketsumata-toge Pass' (Butt crack mountain pass) since it resembles a pair of buttocks when viewed from front from Nishi-Maizuru City.

sen.j: 京都府道66号志高西舞鶴線
sen.e: Nara and Kyoto Prefectural Road No.66 on Shidaka Nishimaizuru Line.
Nara and Kyoto Prefectural Road No.66 on Shidaka Nishimaizuru Line.
Shidaka Nishi-Maizuru Line of Kyoto Prefectural Route 66
sen.cmt: 道路表現を変更しました。

tit.cmt: 小タイトル用に小文字に変更しました。

sen.j: 峠の道路幅は、ほぼ1～1.5車線道路となっており、比較的角度が急目で小回りのカーブが連続している。
sen.e: The width of the road at the mountain pass is mainly 1 to 1.5 lanes and has series of small turns with sharp angle.
The width of the road at the mountain pass is mainly 1 to 1.5 lanes and has a series of small turns with sharp angles.
The width of the road at the mountain pass is mainly 1 to 1.5 lanes and has a series of small turns with sharp angles.

sen.j: その割に、朝晩の通勤時間帯には、加佐地区と西舞鶴地区とを結ぶメイン道路である国道175号線が頻繁に渋滞するため、それを避けるための往来が多い。
sen.e: On the other hand, traffic jam occurs frequently on National Route 175, the main road that connects Kasa and Nishimaizuru regions that many traffic that tries to avoid it is present.
On the other hand, traffic jams occur frequently on National Route 175, the main road that connects Kasa and Nishimaizuru regions, resulting in many that try to avoid the route.

On the other hand, traffic jams occur frequently on National Route 175, the main road that connects Kasa and Nishi-Maizuru regions, resulting in many that try to avoid the route and use the road at the mountain pass instead.

sen.j: なお、都市計画上は一応拡幅計画の遡上にあがっているが、事業化の見通しは全く立っていない。
sen.e: The plan to widen the road is already placed at the top of the list of the city planning, but there is no prospect of actual work as of yet.
Plans to widen the road have already been placed at the top of the list for city planning, but there is no prospect for actual work as of yet.
Plans to widen the road have already been placed at the top of the list for city planning, but there is no prospect for actual work as of yet.

sen.j: 古くは江戸時代から丹後田辺藩主の参勤交代や商用などに使われていた。
sen.e: It was used for commercial purpose or Sankin Kotai (daimyo's alternate-year residence in Edo) of the head of Tanabe Domain of Tango Province from the ancient Edo Period.
It was used for commercial purpose or Sankin Kotai (daimyo's alternate-year residence in Edo) of the head of Tanabe Domain of Tango Province from the ancient Edo Period.
It was used for commercial purpose or Sankin Kotai (daimyo's alternate-year residence in Edo) of the lord of Tanabe Domain of Tango Province from Edo period.
sen.cmt: period 小文字にしました。

sen.j: また、大正には、西舞鶴駅－宮津駅間の鉄道敷設に際し、当初、この峠を経て由良川に出、川沿いに北上させる計画であったが、工事に困難を極め、現在のルート（北近畿タンゴ鉄道北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線西舞鶴駅～丹後神崎駅）に敷設された。
sen.e: In addition, there was a plan to build the rail road between Nishimaizuru and Miyazu Stations across the mountain pass by jutting out at Yura River and run it north along the river, but the construction proved difficult and was constructed on the current route (Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line Nishi Maizuru Station - Tango Kanzaki Station).

In addition, there was a plan to build a rail road between Nishimaizuru and Miyazu Stations across the mountain pass by jutting out at Yura River and running it north along the river, but construction proved difficult and it was constructed on the current route (Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line Nishi Maizuru Station - Tango Kanzaki Station).

In addition, there was a plan to build a rail road between Nishi-Maizuru and Miyazu Stations across the mountain pass by jutting out at the Yura-gawa River and running it north along the river, but construction proved difficult and it was constructed on the current route (Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line Nishi-Maizuru Station - Tango Kanzaki Station).
sen.cmt: Nishi-Maizuru としました。"the" を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: 峠の山が薄暗いためか、昭和期には、頂上付近で縊死自殺をするものが多いとされ、自殺の名所として知られていた。
sen.e: Since the mountain of the mountain pass was dark, there were many who committed suicide by hanging near the mountain top during Showa Period and is noted for famous suicide place.
Since the mountain of the mountain pass was dark, there were many who committed suicide by hanging near the mountain top during Showa Period and is noted as a famous suicide place.
Since the mountain of the mountain pass was dark, there were many who committed suicide by hanging near the mountain top during Showa period and is noted as a famous suicide place.
sen.cmt: period 小文字にしました。
